name: Shoot for life: Shooting Game
description:
Welcome to our first project we are sure you will like and support to keep us working hard to provide the best user experience.
You are entering in the battle arena landing from a plane through parachute. Pick the van nearby and drive into battle fort. there are number of different groups who are fighting with each other to capture the possession of ancient fort. You have an advanced gun with you in the beginning pick up the guns and snipers and other asset hidden in the different places within the field of battle. Hide yourself and aim and shoot the enemies who can attack you from any side. Become the last man survivor standing in the free shooting arena battle.
Your feedback is valuable for us to improve and fix any issue to facilitate you with our best product.
Thanks,
